Package edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.util

Class Worker

java.lang.Object
edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.util.Worker
public abstract class Worker extends Object
Worker provides a convenient way to run long, time-consuming processes that provide occasional updates on their progress.
Author:
Stephen G. Ware

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static interface 
    Worker.Getter<T>
    A getter is a Worker whose long-running process returns a value.
    static interface 
    Worker.Runner
    A runner is a Worker whose long-running process does not return a value.
    static class 
    Worker.Status
    A status object stores the message that will be displayed occasionally as a long-running process runs; the process should update this message to reflect its current status.

    static final <T> T
    get(Worker.Getter<T> getter)

      public Worker()

  • Method Details

    • get

      public static final <T> T get(Worker.Getter<T> getter, Worker.Status status, int frequency, TimeUnit unit)
      Runs a Worker.Getter, printing a status update from a given status to standard output with a given frequency until a value is returned or an exception is thrown.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of value returned by the getter
      Parameters:
      getter - the getter
      status - the status object to be updated while the getter runs and which will be printed to standard output each update
      frequency - the number of time units that will pass between updates
      unit - the time unit that will pass between updates
      Returns:
      the value returned by the getter
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the getter throws an exception

    • get

    • run

      public static final void run(Worker.Runner runner, Worker.Status status, int frequency, TimeUnit unit)
      Runs a Worker.Runner, printing a status update from a given status to standard output with a given frequency until the runner is done or an exception is thrown.
      Parameters:
      runner - the runner
      status - the status object to be updated while the runner runs and which will be printed to standard output each update
      frequency - the number of time units that will pass between updates
      unit - the time unit that will pass between updates
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the getter throws an exception
